item.title: Teen Bitcoin Investor Designs 'Marvel,' a Virtual Reality Headset
item.description:
Teen Bitcoin Investor Designs 'Marvel,' a Virtual Reality Headset

A teenage entrepreneur named Erik Finman founded a social media company called Also read: Inkshares Combines Crowdfunded Publishing with Bitcoin Botangle after turning $1,000 USD worth of bitcoin into $100,000 at the age of 13. Now, at 17 years old, he is creating a virtual reality headset called the Marvel .

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis 5/09/2016
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis 5/09/2016

Bitcoin is undergoing a correction toward the upward trend. That rebound can become a turn to decline. A stop and a rebound of Bitcoin's price off the level of large trading volumes at $456 indicates that that trend is backed by some degree of support.

item.title: 360° Chinese Bitcoin Mine - Brit Lab - BBC Future
item.description:
360° Chinese Bitcoin Mine - Brit Lab - BBC Future

In China, savvy entrepreneurs are making millions a year by mining bitcoin. Danny Vincent visited one of the world's biggest facilities of its kind to film the activity and people within. Read the full article on BBC Future: http://www.bbc.com/future/story/20160504-we-looked-inside-a-secret-chinese-bitcoin-mine Subscribe for more awesome science - http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=HeadsqueezeTV http://www.youtube.com/user/HeadsqueezeTV

item.title: Bitcoin Core Dev: Gavin Andresen's GitHub Privileges Were A "Liability"
item.description:
Bitcoin Core Dev: Gavin Andresen's GitHub Privileges Were A "Liability"

Gavin Andresen, chief scientist at the Bitcoin Core Foundation and former chief developer of the Bitcoin source code had his commit access revoked recently. The move, a collective one taken by Bitcoin Core developers, left Andresen without any administrator or commit privileges after publicly backing Craig Wright's claim that he was Satoshi Nakamoto, Bitcoin's creator.

item.title: Documentary: The Bitcoin Gospel (VPRO Backlight)
item.description:
Documentary: The Bitcoin Gospel (VPRO Backlight)

Is bitcoin the blueprint for a bankless currency, or the biggest pyramid scheme ever? What if we could create money ourselves, without the need for banks? Money that can't be forged, that will appreciate rather than depreciate, and that can be used worldwide without transaction costs.

item.title: Bitcoin's on a bull run again
item.description:
Bitcoin's on a bull run again

The price of bitcoin has been climbing all year, even as a "civil war" has divided its community of developers, and an Australian man has claimed to be its creator in a highly orchestrated media spectacle in recent days. Bitcoin is now trading at $457, according to the Bitcoin Price Index maintained by CoinDesk.

item.title: Bitrated faces severe DDoS attack and $3,200 ransom demand
item.description:
Bitrated faces severe DDoS attack and $3,200 ransom demand

A couple of hours ago, Bitrated, a bitcoin trust platform meant for reputation management and consumer protection has posted a tweet, warning users about an ongoing DDoS attack, carried out in the form of an extortion attempts. During the last couple of weeks, numerous Bitcoin-related companies, but also other businesses from all around the world have been affected by such attacks.

item.title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/09/2016
item.description:
Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/09/2016

Ethereum is forming a short-term flat. The situation is heating up. Powerful impulses usually follow after long flats such as the current one. So far, this movement seems to be a correction toward the upward trend. Ethereum's price has rebounded off the level of large volumes, around $9.

item.title: Bitcoin Q&A: What will happen during The Halvening 2016? - Mining Haves & Have-nots
item.description:
Bitcoin Q&A: What will happen during The Halvening 2016? - Mining Haves & Have-nots

Keywords/phrases: the Halvening / Bitcoin halving. Block reward, ending the era of 25 BTC & entering the era of 12.5 BTC. Differences in monetary policy expectations with Bitcoin vs. central banks. Transition from CPU to GPU to FPGA to ASIC mining and back again. The wall in Moore's Law.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - Calm before the storm
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - Calm before the storm

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candle analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.
